page.title: 15ALSTON MOOR FESTIVITIES.
page.content:
{ CAROLS BY CANDLELIGHT. One of the{events}held just before {Christmas}is Carols by Candlelight. It has become a tradition as it has been going for several years.{Entertainment is provided by musical groups of all ages from the whole of Alston Moor. Everybody sings carols and enjoys mince pies by candlelight. It is a popular event.
{ GALA DAY. The{queen}is chosen by ballot from the 13 to 15 age group and leads the {procession}of decorated floats through the town.{Competitions}include: fancy dress, pram race, children's sports. Prizes are presented by a notable person. The queen is crowned at a dance the night before. The event is very well attended.
